original_text: After this manner he made the ten stands. All of them were cast alike, of the same measure and the same form.
korean_text: 이와 같이 받침 수레 열 개를 만들었는데 그 부어 만든 법과 크기와 양식을 다 동일하게 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: After this manner he made the ten stands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이와 같이 열 개의 받침대를 만들었다.

sentences.original_text: All of them were cast alike,
of the same measure and the same form.
